query: Gruner consultancy projects hydro-electric power plant construction last 10 years

results.text:
Leading in hydropower and
dam engineering / PROJECTS
> 6,000 / EMPLOYEES
1,100+ / NATIONALITIES
49 / LOCATIONS
35 / SECTORS

Aya PSP
Maris South Channel HPP

Successfully completed projects in over 52 countries
Gruner operates from nine strategically located branch offices
worldwide and is recognized as a world-class engineering
consultancy specializing in renewable energy and infrastructure
projects. We have successfully completed more than 100 major
projects in 52 countries, involving the construction, extension,
upgrading, and rehabilitation of dams and hydropower plants
both in Switzerland and internationally.

Expertise, role, services offered

> Masterplans, pre-feasibility and feasibility studies

> Preliminary design, project review, and project approval

> Tender design and preparation of tender documents

> Procurement and contractual assistance

> Detailed design and construction drawings

> Works supervision and construction management

> Operation and maintenance assistance

Our expertise spans the design and supervision of water transfer
schemes, river re-naturalization systems, irrigation networks, and
flood control infrastructure. We maintain a fully integrated in-
frastructure department specializing in civil and industrial struc-
tures, buildings, bridges, and tunnels.

> Due diligence and expertise

> Specialized studies and technical assistance

> Project development and management

Our scope of services covers all stages of project lifecycles for
both greenfield and brownfield developments. We integrate ad-
vanced tools, new standards, digital solutions, and Building Infor-
mation Modelling (BIM) into our methodologies. Gruner is fully
capable of assuming comprehensive project roles, acting as
Owner’s Engineer, Specialist Advisor, Employer’s Technical Di-
rector, EPC Designer, Bid/Tender Documents Reviewer, Lender’s
Engineer, and Technical Advisor.

[images:2]

More than 100 years of experience in
hydropower & dam engineering in Switzer-
land, Europe and worldwide make Gruner
the trustworthy and competent partner
for developers, owners, contractors as
well as investors and lenders.

Gruner is a leading Swiss based engineering
and design consultancy firm.

Our core businesses:
> Energy
> Infrastructure
> Building

As an independent Swiss engineering consultancy, Gruner is
proud of its history and core competencies in dam and hydropow-
er design. Our team of multidisciplinary experts can perform com-
prehensive inspections and review all aspects of the design, con-
struction,commissioning and O&M of PSP projects.

Core services: Hydropower & dams

> Dam safety surveillance and management services

> Dam heightening and rehabilitation services

> Penstocks and pressure shaft engineering

> Scan2BIM, topographic and bathymetric surveying services

> Underground and geotechnical engineering

> Pumped storage projects (PSP)

results.text:
NOTRE SAVOIR-FAIRE / WWW.GRUNER.CH / DOMAINES D'ACTIVITÉ / ANNÉES D'EXPÉRIENCE
DOMAINES D'ACTIVITÉ / FILIALES ET BUREAUX DE PROJET / PRESTATIONS / EXPERTISE

Fondée en 1926, Gruner Stucky SA (anciennement connue
sous le nom de Stucky SA et qui opère désormais sous la
marque Gruner) est un leader international dans le domaine
de l’énergie. La force de Gruner Stucky réside dans la
multidisciplinarité de ses collaborateurs et dans l’expérience
de ses ingénieurs dans le domaine des réseaux de transport
et de distribution d’énergie électrique jusqu’à 420 kV.
Gruner (fondée en 1862) compte plus de 1'000 ingénieurs et
personnel spécialisé.

> Transport
d’électricité
(lignes,
postes,
contrôle-
commande)
> Centrales électriques (hydroélectriques et thermiques)
> Installations électriques ferroviaires
> Aménagements
hydroélectriques
et
de
pompage-
turbinage
> Barrage, y compris réhabilitation, renforcement et

surélévation: barrages-voûtes double courbure, barrages
poids de tous types
> Aménagements hydrauliques et transferts d’eau
> Conduites forcées et équipement hydromécanique
> Gestion des ressources en eau, études hydrologiques
> Tunnels et structures souterraines
> Ingénierie environnementale, gestion des eaux et risques

Le siège de Gruner Stucky se situe à Renens, en Suisse. Par
l’intermédiaire de ses filiales et bureaux de projet, la société
est présente en Algérie, République démocratique du Congo
(GRUNER RDC), Géorgie (Gruner Stucky Caucasus), Iran
(Stucky Iran), au Myanmar, en Serbie (Gruner Balkans),
Turquie (Stucky Teknik) et au Tadjikistan (Stucky Tajikistan).

naturels, protection contre les crues
> Etudes environnementales, sociales et économiques
> Etudes spéciales, surveillance des barrages, sécurité des

> Plans directeurs, études préliminaires et de faisabilité
> Avant-projet, revue de projet, demandes de concession et

barrages, réaction alcali-granulat (RAG)
> Formation, renforcement des capacités et transfert de

de permis de construire

contractuelle

> Supervision et direction des travaux
> Exploitation et maintenance

> Etudes spéciales, assistance technique
> Développement et gestion de projet

> Génie électrique
> Génie mécanique
> Génie civil (y c. modélisation numérique statique et

dynamique, instrumentation et surveillance d’ouvrages)
> Géotechnique, géologie et mécanique des roches
> Hydrologie
(y
c.
météorologie
et
influence
des
changements climatiques)
> Hydraulique appliquée, sédiments, analyses transitoires
> Systèmes d'information géographique et topographie
> Etudes environnementales et sociales
> Etudes économiques et financières
> Développement et gestion de projets

results.text:
Leading in hydropower and
dam engineering
We are experts in
Pumped Storage Projects (PSP) / → / PROJECTS
5,996 / SALES IN CHF
157 mn / PROJECTS IN CH
77 % / TURNOVER IN CH
82 % / OFFICES
35 / FMHL+
480MW
●
Ritom
120 MW
 
● / 900 MW

More than 100 years of experience in
hydropower & dam engineering in Switzer-
land, Europe and worldwide make Gruner
the trustworthy and competent partner
for developers, owners, contractors as
well as investors and lenders.

Gruner is a leading Swiss based engineering
and design consultancy firm.

To promote …
> Energy reliability and grid stability
> Sustainability and renewable integration
> Energy storage and flexibility
> Renewable energy support
> Long operational lifespan
> Reduced environmental and social impacts

… we provide

> Advanced structural analysis and modeling

> Highly experienced and trained experts

Our core businesses:
> Energy
> Infrastructure
> Building

> Enhanced collaborative platforms

> Multidisciplinary teams

> Comprehensive A-to-Z services

As an independent Swiss engineering consultancy, Gruner is
proud of its history and core competencies in dam and hydropow-
er design. Our team of multidisciplinary experts can perform com-
prehensive inspections and review all aspects of the design, con-
struction,commissioning and O&M of PSP projects.

As concerns over climate change and independent energy supply
continue to rise, energy storage and regulation are rapidly becom-
ing an important aspect for the operation of grid networks at-
tempting to maximally enable and integrate the renewable energy
resources.

Efficient with marginal impact on natural flow regimes
Technical, environmental and social challenges can be efficiently
mitigated as the pumped-storage schemes generally operate in
a closed loop or take advantage of vast natural lakes with only
marginal impact on the natural flow regimes.

Core services: Hydropower & dams

Our comprehensive, expert-led services for PSP combine ad-
vanced structural modeling, collaborative digital platforms, and
multidisciplinary expertise to ensure reliable energy storage,
seamless renewable integration, and long-term energy solutions
that efficiently power the grid for generations.

Specialist knowledge for all needs
Over the years Gruner has acquired and actively maintains state-
of-the-art specialist knowledge of pump-turbine technology (in-
cluding variable-speed) as well as the civil and hydraulic design
of pumped storage projects.

> Dam safety surveillance and management services

> Dam heightening and rehabilitation services

> Penstocks and pressure shaft engineering

> Scan2BIM, topographic and bathymetric surveying services

> Underground and geotechnical engineering

> Pumped storage projects (PSP)

EMPLOYEES
>1,000
from
49 countries

> Hydromechanical and electromechanical equipment
engineering

> Design, construction and modernisation of transmission
lines and substations

> Hydraulic and river engineering

query: Gruner Arctic region Greenland hydro-electric consultancy projects

results.text:
Leading in hydropower and
dam engineering / PROJECTS
> 6,000 / EMPLOYEES
1,100+ / NATIONALITIES
49 / LOCATIONS
35 / SECTORS

Aya PSP
Maris South Channel HPP

Successfully completed projects in over 52 countries
Gruner operates from nine strategically located branch offices
worldwide and is recognized as a world-class engineering
consultancy specializing in renewable energy and infrastructure
projects. We have successfully completed more than 100 major
projects in 52 countries, involving the construction, extension,
upgrading, and rehabilitation of dams and hydropower plants
both in Switzerland and internationally.

Expertise, role, services offered

> Masterplans, pre-feasibility and feasibility studies

> Preliminary design, project review, and project approval

> Tender design and preparation of tender documents

> Procurement and contractual assistance

> Detailed design and construction drawings

> Works supervision and construction management

> Operation and maintenance assistance

Our expertise spans the design and supervision of water transfer
schemes, river re-naturalization systems, irrigation networks, and
flood control infrastructure. We maintain a fully integrated in-
frastructure department specializing in civil and industrial struc-
tures, buildings, bridges, and tunnels.

> Due diligence and expertise

> Specialized studies and technical assistance

> Project development and management

Our scope of services covers all stages of project lifecycles for
both greenfield and brownfield developments. We integrate ad-
vanced tools, new standards, digital solutions, and Building Infor-
mation Modelling (BIM) into our methodologies. Gruner is fully
capable of assuming comprehensive project roles, acting as
Owner’s Engineer, Specialist Advisor, Employer’s Technical Di-
rector, EPC Designer, Bid/Tender Documents Reviewer, Lender’s
Engineer, and Technical Advisor.

> Procurement and contractual assistance

> Detailed design and construction drawings

> Works supervision and construction management

> Operation and maintenance assistance

Our expertise spans the design and supervision of water transfer
schemes, river re-naturalization systems, irrigation networks, and
flood control infrastructure. We maintain a fully integrated in-
frastructure department specializing in civil and industrial struc-
tures, buildings, bridges, and tunnels.

> Due diligence and expertise

> Specialized studies and technical assistance

> Project development and management

Our scope of services covers all stages of project lifecycles for
both greenfield and brownfield developments. We integrate ad-
vanced tools, new standards, digital solutions, and Building Infor-
mation Modelling (BIM) into our methodologies. Gruner is fully
capable of assuming comprehensive project roles, acting as
Owner’s Engineer, Specialist Advisor, Employer’s Technical Di-
rector, EPC Designer, Bid/Tender Documents Reviewer, Lender’s
Engineer, and Technical Advisor.

[images:2]
titles:
Leading in hydropower and
dam engineering

results.text:
NOTRE SAVOIR-FAIRE / WWW.GRUNER.CH / DOMAINES D'ACTIVITÉ / ANNÉES D'EXPÉRIENCE
DOMAINES D'ACTIVITÉ / FILIALES ET BUREAUX DE PROJET / PRESTATIONS / EXPERTISE

Fondée en 1926, Gruner Stucky SA (anciennement connue
sous le nom de Stucky SA et qui opère désormais sous la
marque Gruner) est un leader international dans le domaine
de l’énergie. La force de Gruner Stucky réside dans la
multidisciplinarité de ses collaborateurs et dans l’expérience
de ses ingénieurs dans le domaine des réseaux de transport
et de distribution d’énergie électrique jusqu’à 420 kV.
Gruner (fondée en 1862) compte plus de 1'000 ingénieurs et
personnel spécialisé.

> Transport
d’électricité
(lignes,
postes,
contrôle-
commande)
> Centrales électriques (hydroélectriques et thermiques)
> Installations électriques ferroviaires
> Aménagements
hydroélectriques
et
de
pompage-
turbinage
> Barrage, y compris réhabilitation, renforcement et

surélévation: barrages-voûtes double courbure, barrages
poids de tous types
> Aménagements hydrauliques et transferts d’eau
> Conduites forcées et équipement hydromécanique
> Gestion des ressources en eau, études hydrologiques
> Tunnels et structures souterraines
> Ingénierie environnementale, gestion des eaux et risques

Le siège de Gruner Stucky se situe à Renens, en Suisse. Par
l’intermédiaire de ses filiales et bureaux de projet, la société
est présente en Algérie, République démocratique du Congo
(GRUNER RDC), Géorgie (Gruner Stucky Caucasus), Iran
(Stucky Iran), au Myanmar, en Serbie (Gruner Balkans),
Turquie (Stucky Teknik) et au Tadjikistan (Stucky Tajikistan).

results.text:
Leading in hydropower and
dam engineering
We are experts in
Pumped Storage Projects (PSP) / → / PROJECTS
5,996 / SALES IN CHF
157 mn / PROJECTS IN CH
77 % / TURNOVER IN CH
82 % / OFFICES
35 / FMHL+
480MW
●
Ritom
120 MW
 
● / 900 MW

More than 100 years of experience in
hydropower & dam engineering in Switzer-
land, Europe and worldwide make Gruner
the trustworthy and competent partner
for developers, owners, contractors as
well as investors and lenders.

Gruner is a leading Swiss based engineering
and design consultancy firm.

To promote …
> Energy reliability and grid stability
> Sustainability and renewable integration
> Energy storage and flexibility
> Renewable energy support
> Long operational lifespan
> Reduced environmental and social impacts

… we provide

> Advanced structural analysis and modeling

> Highly experienced and trained experts

Our core businesses:
> Energy
> Infrastructure
> Building

> Enhanced collaborative platforms

> Multidisciplinary teams

> Comprehensive A-to-Z services

As an independent Swiss engineering consultancy, Gruner is
proud of its history and core competencies in dam and hydropow-
er design. Our team of multidisciplinary experts can perform com-
prehensive inspections and review all aspects of the design, con-
struction,commissioning and O&M of PSP projects.

As concerns over climate change and independent energy supply
continue to rise, energy storage and regulation are rapidly becom-
ing an important aspect for the operation of grid networks at-
tempting to maximally enable and integrate the renewable energy
resources.

Efficient with marginal impact on natural flow regimes
Technical, environmental and social challenges can be efficiently
mitigated as the pumped-storage schemes generally operate in
a closed loop or take advantage of vast natural lakes with only
marginal impact on the natural flow regimes.

Core services: Hydropower & dams

Our comprehensive, expert-led services for PSP combine ad-
vanced structural modeling, collaborative digital platforms, and
multidisciplinary expertise to ensure reliable energy storage,
seamless renewable integration, and long-term energy solutions
that efficiently power the grid for generations.

Specialist knowledge for all needs
Over the years Gruner has acquired and actively maintains state-
of-the-art specialist knowledge of pump-turbine technology (in-
cluding variable-speed) as well as the civil and hydraulic design
of pumped storage projects.

> Dam safety surveillance and management services

> Dam heightening and rehabilitation services

> Penstocks and pressure shaft engineering

> Scan2BIM, topographic and bathymetric surveying services

> Underground and geotechnical engineering

> Pumped storage projects (PSP)

EMPLOYEES
>1,000
from
49 countries

> Hydromechanical and electromechanical equipment
engineering

> Design, construction and modernisation of transmission
lines and substations

> Hydraulic and river engineering

Some of our pumped-storage projects

As of 2023

2,200 m

> Contract managment

●Grand Paradiso
250 MW

1,800 m

From concept study , design to site supervision and commissioning

Head

We can offer our clients a comprehensive “one-stop-shop” range of engineering,
consulting and project management services. We also have comprehensive experience
of all the engineering roles and thus can act as Owner’s Engineer, EPC Contractor’s
Engineer or indeed as Lender’s Technical Advisor.

rag_answer:
**Answer**

| Entry (document ID) | Meets the “Arctic/Greenland hydro‑electric consultancy” criteria? | Why it does / does not meet the criteria |
|---------------------|---------------------------------------------------------------|------------------------------------------|
| a914ac7e‑1b77‑49b0‑89eb‑20d5fc2178de | **No** | The text only lists “UNDERGROUND SPACE / COUNTRIES, CLIENTS” and contains no reference to Greenland, the Arctic, or hydro‑electric consultancy work. |
| 8156a8ba‑4f34‑4c22‑b705‑58d365043918 | **No** | The excerpt is about “UNDERGROUND SPACE / DESIGN & TECHNICAL SERVICES” with no mention of Greenland, the Arctic, or hydro‑electric projects. |
| f5c21da0‑1888‑4f7c‑8f96‑6426557d16b9 | **No** | This brochure highlights Gruner’s global hydro‑electric and dam engineering portfolio, but it lists projects such as Aya PSP and Maris South Channel HPP—none are in Greenland or the Arctic. |
| d7d394ee‑6e78‑43a4‑8194‑c5e5eabe78e0 | **No** | The document lists Gruner’s activity areas and country presence (e.g., Algeria, DR Congo, Georgia, Iran, Myanmar, Serbia, Turkey, Tajikistan). Greenland or the Arctic are not mentioned. |
| 0b6b04aa‑bae7‑4478‑b39b‑d3a2c8036e1a | **No** | The brochure enumerates pumped‑storage projects worldwide (e.g., Grand Paradiso, Lago Bianco, Enguri, etc.) but contains no reference to Greenland or the Arctic region. |

**Conclusion**

None of the provided documents contain evidence that Gruner has undertaken consultancy for construction or civil‑engineering work on hydro‑electric power plants in Greenland or the Arctic region within the last 10 years. Therefore, no candidate/entry meets the specified criteria.
